alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 2:21AM MDT until March 14 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Butte, Georgetown Lake, Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, Homestake Pass, MacDonald Pass, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A period of heavy snow with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour is expected between 3am and 6am, bringing low visibility. Falling temperatures may allow for ice to develop on paved surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
